item.description:
(Cut me some slack, do you know how hard it is to make these event names creative?)

If you're up for it, join me for another ride - this one is shorter (~15 miles) and closer (Foxboro/Sharon). It's the shorter route from the 30-miler we did a few weeks ago. This route will go through Foxboro/Sharon/Mansfield -- those of you who joined us last time will remember the hillS (yes, plural) on Oak Street.

Before the tryptophan kicks in, before you settle in for the day of football and crudites, before the horror of Black Friday and the assault of non-stop-24-hour-looped-Christmas-carols begins...join me for some sanity. It'll make you a better person.

Oh, and then after the workout we'll head to Waxy's for some beers.

PS - you'll notice the early start...it's getting dark out there early. We should assume the safety of an inside shelter....preferably one that also serves cheese fries.
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the spots closest to Main Street (furthest from stores). Just look for the bikes, guys!
item.name: Before the 'Gobble' Comes the Grind
